top.title: What we know about Trump's  'framework of future deal' over Greenland
top.summary: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

top.title: Two dead and several missing in New Zealand landslides
top.summary: Heavy rains have ravaged the country's North Island, with a minister comparing it to a "war zone".

top.title: UK holds off joining Trump's Board of Peace over Putin concerns
top.summary: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says the Russian president has shown no commitment to peace in Ukraine.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

top.title: Bezos' Blue Origin announces satellite rival to Musk's Starlink
top.summary: Blue Origin will be focused on businesses and governments, while Starlink also offers services to individual customers.

top.title: Snap settles social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial
top.summary: TikTok, YouTube and Meta remain defendants in the case, which is due to kick off next week.

title.#text: Big games are getting bigger — and so are the stakes
Hundreds of creatives warn against an AI slop future
Blue Origin’s Starlink rival TeraWave promises 6-terabit satellite internet
